Title: La vraie nature de Bernadette
Actors: Micheline Lanctôt, Donald Pilon, Reynald Bouchard, Robert Rivard
Plot: A woman imbued with naturalistic and libertarian theories leaves her city home to live in the countryside with her young son. There she meets a litigious farmer who fights against the banks and the government, in which she will be somehow involved. Meanwhile, practising her theories, she makes some old men very happy and, by chance even passes as a saint!
